metadata.synopsis: Jaheira responds to the player picking up an item - if not expressly told they can.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go into Jaheira's basement- Go behind the secret bookcase- Start looting infront of her, after she hasn't said you can

0.speaker: Jaheira
0.text: Oh, by all means, help yourself. I'm sure there are some mouldering socks to be ransacked, too.
